entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @realDonaldTrump @WhiteHouse Over 90,000 Americans have died from Coronavirus. Our economy is in a downward spiral at Great Depression-levels. Trump doesn’t want the public to focus on his many failures of leadership, so, to paraphrase Steve Bannon: His people are flooding the zone with excrement.
